DOC.brief_title: Curcumin Treating Patients With Familial Adenomatous Polyposis
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To determine randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled study tolerability effectiveness curcumin regress intestinal adenoma measure duodenal colorectal/ileal polyp number , polyp size familial adenomatous polyposis patient intact colon , ileorectal anastomosis surgery , ileo-anal pullthrough ( reservoir ) surgery . II . To measure marker cell proliferation include colorectal mucosal level ornithine decarboxylase ( ODC ) , polyamines , mucosal deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) methylation , proliferative index ( Ki67 antiproliferative cell nuclear antibody ) , apoptosis index , vascular density , mucosal prostaglandin , leukotriene level , activation nuclear factor kappa B ( NFKB ) , v-akt murine thymoma viral oncogene homolog 1 ( Akt ) survival pathway . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients receive curcumin orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) 12 month . ARM II : Patients receive placebo PO BID 12 month . After completion study treatment , patient follow 4 month .
